1.0.name: wordpress/addauthor
1.0.description: This plugin allow you to show where you want, inside the loop, a gravatar of the author of the post, the description of the author of the post, the nick of the author of the post and the date of the post.PAY ATTENTION if you are upgrading, please take note that CSS is changed, you find a CSS example in sample.css, copy it in yours style.css and apply the change you need
